title: I can't deal,  Think its time to return to dota for a while
body:
I don't know if it is terrible match making, or the lack of attention spent on dealling with toxic players outside of chat log.
Either way match making feels crap, and toxicity is very poorly handled compared to other games (if you disagree try intentionally ruining games on dota and do it on league and watch how much faster your punished).

Yet Riot will punish you for using language that could cause arguments.   

yamatocannon says it perfectly
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ITlJYsnXs0o&t=12s

replies.body:
It's moreso that Riot just does not care about ranked at the end of the day. 
I submitted a ticket to riot about it and go "it's fine, works perfectly, nothing wrong"
When I brought up the amount of AFKs, inters and trolls, the ticket instantly got blacklisted and you could no longer reply to it.

Yep, I've been playing since season one and this game in that whole 10 years has never improved in this aspect. Why don't we gain lp on how we perform in a match, the system is basically already with the after game scores. If i play shit and my team carries me why do I deserve 30lp just like the guy who carried us, or vice versa if we carry why do trolls and feeders sometimes get free wins. And again if I have a bloke rage quit in game, or gets banned for being a dickhead and we lose the game why the hell do we still lose lp, the games just a joke it really is at least dota you can kick trolls and get bots.

Also get penalized within a few matches for obvious trolling or afking, and you cant go straight back into ranked if you are penalized. I'm not a fan of low priority game/jail thing, but atleast restrict those players who intentionally ruin game from playing ranked until their honor level 1. They implemented it JUST for 'rewards', maybe use it for something that actually matters too??

Yeah look i'm obviously all for tougher penalties for people who do the wrong thing, but thing is that doesn't help the people who they have already ruined the experience for. I mean in OCE man I swear every game has someone who is just spiteful or so full of themself on my team or the opposite team. We need things in place to protect players that are already in the games that have been ruined, these guys getting banned after my match I don't give a fuck about really
Its not just OCE I watch a few higher elo players in NA and HOLY POOP
